chat

Class Chatroom

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.Chatroom

  • public abstract class Chatroom
extends java.lang.Object
    A Chatroom is a room inside the Chatbox. It has a Members component to indicate the users in the room. It has a comments component to store Members' posts (Strings) onto the chatroom.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> comments 
      (package private) java.util.Collection<Member> members

      (package private) abstract void addComment(Member member, java.lang.String message)
      AddComment adds the given message to this.comments with the given member's name.
      (package private) abstract void addMember(Chat chat, Member member)
      AddMember adds the given member to this.members.
      (package private) abstract void removeMember(Member member)
      RemoveMember removes the given member from this.members.

    • Method Detail

      • addComment

        abstract void addComment(Member member,
              java.lang.String message)
        AddComment adds the given message to this.comments with the given member's name.

      • addMember

        abstract void addMember(Chat chat,
             Member member)
        AddMember adds the given member to this.members.

      • removeMember

        abstract void removeMember(Member member)
        RemoveMember removes the given member from this.members. This will only be called once the given member decides to leave the chatroom.
